title: What am I waiting for? A clearance?
body: I dced, I reconnected... game was over . I went 16/6/(who cares) on Zed. The best on my team... And i get put on parole? I just dced for LITERALLY  2 mins (If not 1 min. Check). My internet may be having problems, but you guys can stop adding to it. Can't game till next week now. Please do something.

replies.body: The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) lower priority queue only applies after multiple leaves and not just one game.  Even if you return to the match, that's still a period of time teammates are left without a player.  The system will also treat all leaves equally because all leaves cause negative experiences.  Best thing you can do to resolve this is to play consistently without issues.  Let me know if you have any questions!
